description: This file implements the front-end UI for a Tic Tac Toe game using the Qwik framework. It manages game state, user interactions, validation, game logic integration, and an audit trail component. The UI includes a 3x3 grid, status messages, restart button, error handling, and accessibility features.

methods.name: freezeBoard
methods.description: Creates an immutable copy of the board array for audit trail immutability.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the game status message and over flag based on the current board state. Determines if a player has won or if the game is a draw.

methods.name: logEvent
methods.description: Logs audit events with timestamps, user info, and before/after states of the game board.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game cells; validates moves, updates game state, logs events, and manages errors.

methods.name: doReset
methods.description: Resets the game to the initial state, clears audit logs, and logs the reset event.
